name: DeleteFigmaComment
description:
Delete a specific comment in Figma.

Use this tool to delete a comment in Figma. Only the comment's author is permitted to delete it. Call this tool when a user requests to remove their comment.

parameters.name: file_or_branch_key
parameters.description: The unique key of the file or branch from which to delete the comment. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with `branch_data` parameter to obtain the branch key.

value_schema.description: File to delete comment from. This can be a file key or branch key. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with the `branch_data` query param to get the branch key.

parameters.name: comment_id_to_delete
parameters.description: The ID of the comment you wish to delete. Only the author of the comment can perform this action.

value_schema.description: Comment id of comment to delete
